dmg2.description: The versatile or alternative damage dice of the weapon, e.g. "1d10"

detail1.description: A descriptive field that can be used to complete entries in variants.

detail2.description: A descriptive field that can be used to complete entries in variants.

staff.description: Adds the italicized "Staff" text to the item info line (below the name).

crewMin.description: For crews specified as an X-Y min-max.

crewMax.description: For crews specified as an X-Y min-max.

travelCost.description: In copper pieces per mile per passenger.

shippingCost.description: In copper pieces per 100 lbs per mile.

focus.description: Item can be used as a spellcasting focus

atomicPackContents.description: If the item's pack contents should be treated as one atomic unit, rather than handled as individual sub-items.

weightless.description: If the container renders its contents weightless.

items.description:
UIDs of "deck"s to be linked in a "See Also" footnote.
Ex.: "deck of many things|dmg".

UIDs of "vehicle"s to be linked in a "See Also" footnote.
Ex.: "rowboat|gos".

barDimensions.$comment: Not to be confused with the "barDimension", an altogether friendlier place.

hasRefs.description: Whether this item has references within its data to dedicated "itemEntry"s.
